characters: Driver of a green truck, driver of a black car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a wet road at night. The road is illuminated by street lights, and visibility is reduced due to the rain. The self-driving vehicle is following a black car closely, while a green truck is on the right side. The black car ahead suddenly slows down, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate. The green truck on the right side starts to merge into the self-driving vehicles lane, creating a potential cut-in situation.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is decelerating due to the black car ahead slowing down. The vehicle maintains a safe distance from the black car while monitoring the green truck on the right side, which is attempting to merge into the lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A black car, approximately 10 meters away, slowing down, causing the self-driving vehicle to decelerate. 2) Right: A green truck, approximately 5 meters away, merging into the self-driving vehicles lane, creating a potential cut-in situation.
